Treatment repeat every 28 day least 2 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Cohorts 3-6 patient receive escalate dos irinotecan maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) determine . Once MTD irinotecan determine , additional cohort receive escalate dos fluorouracil MTD determine . The MTD define dose precede 2 3 2 6 patient experience dose-limiting toxicity .
